entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
